sentence.Network_en: He had the unselfconsciousness of a child.
sentence.Network_cn: 他具有孩子们才有的一派率真.

list.abs: ...和决定的意识形成流动状态，使自我发展出非自我意识的自我信心（unselfconscious self assurance）。
they were naked , unshy , and unselfconsciously beautiful .她们赤裸着，没有羞耻，自自然然地美丽。
she grew up with him in unselfconscious friendship ., 他和她在一种自然的友谊中长大.
They were naked , unshy , and unselfconsciously beautiful ., 她们赤裸着 , 一点也不害羞 , 自然而美丽.

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being not self-conscious; unawareness of yourself or of others' views of yourself;

sentences.sentence: "he had the unselfconsciousness of a child"

auth_sentence.content: My own enthusiasm for the arts, then, grew up in the fertilising midden of unselfconsciousness.
auth_sentence.res_content: My own enthusiasm for the arts, then, grew up in the fertilising midden of unselfconsciousness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My own enthusiasm for the arts, then, grew up in the fertilising midden of unselfconsciousness.
